author: aconway
msg: DISPATCH-74: Allow changes to logging configuration of a running router.
The qdmanage tool can change logging configuration, examples on the man page.
qdmanage has been made easier to use, so it's not clear a separate tool is justified.
Also some improvements to man page generation.

author: aconway
msg: NO-JIRA: Move run.py to top level build directory, generate config.sh.

author: kwall
msg: Reenable support for SSL and Plain on the same port (i.e. the transport sniffing).  Reenable all TLS tests

author: stain
msg: CMS commit to taverna by stain
